entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. POP 40%

Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
